mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET userpw = #{userpw}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT userid, userpw, name, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, regdate FROM (SELECT rownum rn, userid, userpw, name, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, regdate FROM tbl_user WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
